resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104284</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104284</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206432</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Golden Crescent, Crossroads of Florida and Georgia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der goldene Halbmond, Querstraße von Florida und 
Georgia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le croissant d'or, carrefour de la Floride et 
Géorgie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O crescente dourado, crossroads de Florida e 
Geórgia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mezzaluna dorata, strada trasversale di Florida
e Georgia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρυσή ημισέληνος, σταυροδρόμια της Φλώριδας και της 
Γεωργίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La crescent de oro, encrucijada de la Florida y 
Georgia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the cultural history of the Atlantic Coast from Savannah to Cape Canaveral and inland toward Tallahassee. Maps, texts, and pictures illustrate the area's transformations through its pre-history, colonization, induction into the U.S., reconstruction, struggle for civil rights, and the recent resort boom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft die kulturelle Geschichte der 
atlantischen Küste von Savanne zu Kap Canaveral und inländisches in 
Richtung zu Tallahassee. Karten, Texte und Abbildungen 
veranschaulichen die Transformationen des Bereiches durch seine 
Vorgeschichte, Besiedlung, Induktion in die VEREINIGTEN STAATEN, 
Rekonstruktion, Kampf für Zivilrechte und die neue 
Rücksortierunghochkonjunktur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine l'histoire culturelle de la côte 
atlantique de la savane au cap Canaveral et intérieur vers 
Tallahassee. Les cartes, les textes, et les images illustrent 
les transformations de la zone par sa préhistoire, colonisation, 
induction en les ETATS-UNIS, reconstruction, lutte pour des droits 
civiques, et la perche récente de ressource.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina o history cultural da costa atlantic do 
savannah ao cape Canaveral e inland para Tallahassee. Os mapas, 
os textos, e os retratos ilustram as transformações da área 
através de seu pre-history, de colonização, de indução nos 
ESTADOS UNIDOS, de reconstruction, de esforço para direitas civis, e 
do crescimento recente do recurso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la storia culturale del litorale atlantico
dalla savanna a cape Canaveral ed interno verso Tallahassee. I 
programmi, i testi e le immagini illustrano le trasformazioni della 
zona attraverso il relativo pre-history, la colonizzazione, 
l'induzione in STATI UNITI, la ricostruzione, la lotta per i diritti 
civili e l'asta recente del ricorso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει την πολιτιστική ιστορία της ατλαντικής ακτής
από τη σαβάνα στο ακρωτήριο Canaveral και εσωτερικός προς 
Tallahassee. Οι χάρτες, τα κείμενα, και οι εικόνες 
επεξηγούν τους μετασχηματισμούς της περιοχής μέσω της 
προϊστορίας του, την αποίκιση, την επαγωγή στις ΗΠΑ, την 
αναδημιουργία, την προσπάθεια για τα αστικά δικαιώματα, και τον 
πρόσφατο βραχίονα θερέτρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la historia cultural de la costa 
atlántica de la sabana al cabo Canaveral e interior hacia 
Tallahassee. Las correspondencias, los textos, y los cuadros 
ilustran las transformaciones del área a través de su prehistoria, 
de la colonización, de la inducción en los ESTADOS UNIDOS, de la 
reconstrucción, de la lucha para las derechas civiles, y del auge 
reciente del recurso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206432</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104284</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-golden-crescent-crossroads-of-florida-and-georgia</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
